alert.note: Alert for Upper Wind River Basin, Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued September 03 at 1:45AM MDT until September 04 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * IMPACTS: Low Humidities...Hot Temperatures...and Strong Gusty Winds will create erratic fire behavior and new fire starts. * AFFECTED AREA: In Central WY...Fire Weather Zone 283. * COUNTIES AFFECTED: In Central WY...Fremont. * WIND: Northwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * HUMIDITY: As low as 9 percent. * TEMPERATURES: Highs in the mid to upper 90s.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Upper Wind River Basin, Wind River Basin
